distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libcaca fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-30498, CVE-2021-30499: If an image has a size of 0x0, when exporting, no 
  data is written and space is allocated for the header only, not taking into
  account that sprintf appends a NUL byte (bsc#1184751, bsc#1184752).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in libcaca. A heap buffer overflow in export.c in function export_tga might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: A flaw was found in libcaca. A buffer overflow of export.c in function export_troff might lead to memory corruption and other potential consequences.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
